channel.title: Looking for an additional Web and Game Dev
channel.description:
Hi there Mopar. My name is Devin, and I currently own the Zailyx RS servers (Revisions 718 and 317).
I am on a salaried position so my hours vary weekly and I simply do not have the amount of time I would like to invest in making these servers great. So I have decided after several months, to bring a few new members on to my team.
Current Positions needing to be filled: [code]2X Assistant Content Developer Web Developer: Graphics Artisist:[/code]
If you would like to take a look at the current server we have online and available for play, you can view our current thread below: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,668433.0.html
Please respond below (if interested) with your current credentials and availability schedule, as well as position desired.
Thank you for your time!

item.title: Looking for an additional Web and Game Dev
item.dc:creator: @Simplicity-X Simplicity-X
